item.title: Ariana Grande Promises She Won’t Abandon Music
item.description: The ‘Wicked: For Good’ star took to Instagram to reassure fans she wasn’t planning to leave music behind anytime soon.

item.title: Ariana Grande, Josh Gad to Lead Dr. Seuss’ ‘Oh, the Places You’ll Go!’ Animated Movie
item.description: Jon M. Chu and Jill Culton direct Warner Bros.’ musical from producer J.J. Abrams that adapts Dr. Seuss’ final book.
